In three sentences
Comments

I believe it's very safe, but anytime there's any need to feel not safe, they have ways to make sure everyone is by contact (if there's any need for any warning), and you can call the security (I never have.)
They do a lot of community activities.

It's great for anyone that's getting a basic education (and it transfers well), no matter your age. And it's great for nursing, culinary arts, technical studies, automotive studies, etc. http://www.otc.edu/ Just check for yourself!
You definitely get more than what you pay for here. It's a very inexpensive college and you learn so much here.
What I do for fun there is work out (which is free for all students and faculty.) But I'm sure there's other things you can check out at http://www.otc.edu/
I usually eat at home or somewhere else, just because I'm not at the school all day long, but I have had their food once or twice and it's very good. It's more of a cafe' style.
The *ONLY* reason I put a one star is because it doesn't have dorms...otherwise, it would probably be a 5 star.
They definitely will make you work, but that's just great training for the work field.
Take the time you have here and use it to your advantage. Have fun (and I don't mean partying) while you're here in college; it's supposed to be a great learning experience!
It's a great place. I'm glad I chose this college to start my learning for my career. I wouldn't go anywhere else for basic studies.

textAfterTable: Clubs and Activities There are a whole lot of clubs and activities. Some that I know of are: Choir, Honor Program, Bible study/devotional clubs, etc. Great for these types of students It is great for general ed. students (first time students), nursing, culinary, technical, business, psychology, biology, etc. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus We always have an annual college campus fall festival with music, dancing, prizes, and free food. We also have a back to school festival too that has the same festivities as the fall festival. Bang for the buck The student service there is very helpful and they always seem to have the right answers to everything. What to do for fun There is a fitness center there if you really want to work out on your own time, and you can even request a personal trainer if you want as well. Also there is a great library there if you want to read or do your research there, and there are computer labs to go to to do other things as well as educational purposes. Food and Dining It
